swtransparencyd(8) System Manager's Manual swtransparencyd(8)

NAME

swtransparencyd — The swtransparency daemon.

DESCRIPTION

swtransparencyd swtransparencyd is a system daemon that verifies software transparency information for requesting clients. It is not intended to be invoked directly.

SEE ALSO

launchd(8) launchd.conf(5)
